title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Battle of Ostia, After Giulio Romano", 1813–18
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left corner : 40; at lower right corner: Raffaello Roma. On verso, at center: candegliera/ fondo azzurro/ l'ornato doro/ trofei e posti (?) / coloriti
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Battle of Ostia, After Giulio Romano", 1813–18.
1813–18. Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3509.
